description:
Create virtual private networks on-demand

LogMeIn Hamachi is a hosted VPN service that lets you securely extend LAN-like networks to distributed teams, mobile workers and your gamer friends alike. In minutes
- Fixed an issue where the Hamachi gateway did not set up the network bridge properly
- The static DNS settings of the Hamachi adapter were reset after a Windows update was installed on the Hamachi client
- OpenSSL was updated to 3.0.10
